data.sentence: The word وَهُوَ comes from the root ه و and is associated with the meanings: huwa = He (pronoun. masculine 3rd. sing.)

data.meanings: to be high, elevated, lofty, exalted, ascend, overcome, be proud/upon/over, go up, rise in rank or dignity, raise, take up, mount, overtop.
data.sentence: The word الْأَعْلَى comes from the root ع ل و and is associated with the meanings: to be high, elevated, lofty, exalted, ascend, overcome, be proud/upon/over, go up, rise in rank or dignity, raise, take up, mount, overtop.
